items.abstract: A simple and efficient method for the synthesis of novel water soluble antioxidants in the form of dicationic ionic liquids (DILs) was described in the framework of our study.
title: Synthesis and antioxidant properties of dicationic ionic liquids

items.abstract: 1-Methyl-3-phenylisoquinoline derivatives were synthesized with high efficiency from oximes via Beckmann rearrangement, isomerization and condensation, all promoted by polyphosphate ester.
title: Preparation of 1-methyl-3-phenylisoquinoline derivatives from oximes using polyphosphoric esters
